snippet: A standoff continued between the authorities and an unstable man who took a 5-year-old boy hostage, testing residents.
abstract: Standoff in Midland City, Ala, continues between police and Jimmy Lee Dykes, who shot and killed school bus driver and kidnapped 5-year-old boy who he is holding hostage in underground bunker in his backyard; situation is testing residents of small town.

byline.original: By ROBBIE BROWN and KIM SEVERSON
byline.contributor: Robbie Brown reported from Midland City, Ala., and Kim Severson from Atlanta.

lead_paragraph: A standoff continued between the authorities and an unstable man who took a 5-year-old boy hostage, testing residents.
